long_description: Arm yourself with comfort by including the GCI Wilderness Recliner(TM) chair in your camping arsenal. Folds and transports easily with the patented Auto-Fold system that lets you sling it over your shoulder or carry it backpack-style. Single buckle adjustment allows unlimited lounging positions, making it easy to find your comfort zone. Padded seat and lumbar support let you recline in absolute comfort. Side beverage holder keeps a cold drink within reach at all times. Storage pouch by foot of recliner can stow your sunglasses, cell phone and wallet.
short_description: Arm yourself with comfort by including the GCI Wilderness Recliner(TM) chair in your camping arsenal.
